product.text:
The Princess Who Never Laughed

Young readers will be enchanted by this delightful tale that embraces the importance of happiness, joy, and laughter. A stern King wants his daughter, the Princess, to have a life of seriousness and solemnity. He soon recognizes the error of his ways, and searches for someone who can make his daughter laugh. Goofy, with his untimely antics, fulfills the King’s wish when he succeeds in lifting her royal spirits.

Tie-in Activity: Embrace your child’s sense of humor by challenging him to use his antics and comedic talents to try to make you laugh. Then, use puppets or stuffed animals as props, and put on a comedy skit together.
